alert.note: Alert for Atoka (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 12:32AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Bryan and eastern Atoka Counties through 100 AM CST... At 1232 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles east of Stringtown to near Lane to 3 miles north of Bokchito. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stringtown, Lane, Daisy, McGee Creek Lake, Redden, Bentley and Darwin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
